Package ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers

Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.NotificationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/notifications") public class NotificationController extends Object
Restful api service that receives http requests about existed Notifications in the calendar.
Author:
Anna Aba

  • Method Details

    • getAllNotifications

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllNotifications()
      Returns all notifications (not active also) from the database.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with list of all notifications.

    • getNotificationById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotificationById(@PathVariable int id)
      Returns the notification with this id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the notification.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the notification.

    • getNotificationsByEventId

      @GetMapping("/event/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotificationsByEventId(@PathVariable("id") int eventId)
      Returns all notifications of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the id of the event.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with list of the notifications.

    • addNotifications

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNotifications(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications)
      Adds list of new notifications of an user and of event to the database.
      Parameters:
      notifications - list of new notifications.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of new notifications.

    • updateNotifications

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotifications(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications)
      Updates list of existed notifications.
      Parameters:
      notifications - list of notifications to update.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of updated notifications.

    • softDeleteNotifications

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> softDeleteNotifications(@RequestBody List<Integer> notificationIds)
      Deletes notifications by switching their isActive flag to false.
      Parameters:
      notificationIds - list of ids of the notifications to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with list of deleted notifications.

    • hardDeleteNotifications

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> hardDeleteNotifications(@RequestBody List<Integer> notificationIds)
      Deletes notifications completely from the database.
      Parameters:
      notificationIds - list of ids of the notifications to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with list of deleted notifications.
